channel.description: Hello, Well I add a Christmas event on my server. I would like to no how to add a code that everyone that logs in get a item like a Christmas cracker. But I only what them getting it once. And a message once stating what do with it but only once. Thanks very much peace!

item.title: {PI} Help! Coders Please read thanks!
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

just add a boolean inplayer class

public boolean receivedCracker;

then under initialize() method put

if (!receivedCracker) {
getItems().addItem(CRACKERID, 1);
sendMessage(“You have received a christmas cracker!”);
}

you would also need to save the boolean in playersave

item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

you should look over the way your server code all works together. i wont assume youre using the kind of server that packs everything into one ambigious class. there are a ton of ideas you could use but you need to decide which one and then ask yourself what’s the best way to go with it.

here are a few ideas i came up with myself regarding your christmas event:

a player goes to a special location to retrive his/her item
a player logs in and retrives the item
a player enters some sort of game/competition to retrieve his/her item based on the points that player scored
